mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (sender_id, receiver_id, content) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT m.pk as id, U2.email as sender_email, u.email as receiver_email, m.content, m.created_at ,m.is_read FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.receiver_id = u.id JOIN users u2 ON m.sender_id = u2.id WHERE m.is_deleted IS NOT NULL AND sender_id = (select id from users where email = #{email});
